scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a bearded man wearing a turban adorned with flowers and a flowing garment. He has a long, wavy beard and is gesturing with his left hand, pointing towards the viewer. His right hand holds a staff or scepter. The background is sparsely decorated with circles and abstract shapes, suggesting a non-specific setting. The man's attire and regal bearing imply he is a figure of importance, possibly a king or prophet.
